name: Roller of the Dice
description:
A simple, small game for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Roll of the Dice now in your hands. But can you do it right?

I encourage you to explore controls by yourself since only 6 buttons are used: wasd and qe

Thanks to The Indie Game Orchestra for kindly posting their music online. Check them out: https://theindiegameorchestra.itch.io/free-8-bit-retro-inspired-background-music
